title: Load data into spreadsheet or database
author: Max Tkacz
readme:
This workflow is a generic example of how to load data from your workflow into a destination that stores tabular data. For example, a **Google Sheets** or **Airtable** sheet, a **.CSV** file, or any relational database like **MySQL**.

Generally, you need to ensure that you send well-formatted data into the Spreadsheet or Database node. You can use the [Set](https://docs.n8n.io/nodes/n8n-nodes-base.set/#set) or [Function](https://docs.n8n.io/nodes/n8n-nodes-base.function/#function) node to transform data into the correct format for your destination.

![key_to_table.png](https://f000.backblazeb2.com/file/n8n-website-images/a50b94ba5b3a4b15a288553c797b55a3.png)

## Key concepts

  * Spreadsheets and databases have columns, like "Name" and "Email". The data you send into a Spreadsheet/ Database node needs to match these column names for each row of data that you want to insert. Data points need to be represented as key-value pairs. Specifically, each item of data needs to have a JSON key for each column in the sheet. For a spreadsheet with "Name" and "Email" columns, it would look like: **{"Name" : "Karla", "Email" : "[karla@email.com](mailto:karla@email.com)"}**

  * Before appending or inserting data to a spreadsheet or database, you might need to transform it into the correct format. You can preprocess the data with a [Set](https://docs.n8n.io/nodes/n8n-nodes-base.set/#set) or [Function](https://docs.n8n.io/nodes/n8n-nodes-base.function/#function) node. The Set node allows you to perform simple transforms when the data you want to load into spreadsheet rows is already represented as items. Use the Function node when you need to map nested data (like arrays) inside a single item to their own top-level items ([Example in community forums](https://community.n8n.io/t/getting-all-items-from-trello-api-call/4567/8)).

  * Spreadsheet and database nodes in n8n perform their configured action (like **Append** , **Create Row** , **Write to File**) on each item of input data.




## Workflow walkthrough

[![homepage](https://cdn.loom.com/sessions/thumbnails/eb87068f35a14af095f7b0f020b62211-with-play.jpg)](https://www.loom.com/share/eb87068f35a14af095f7b0f020b62211)
readme_zh:
此工作流程是一个通用示例，展示了如何将工作流中的数据加载到存储表格数据的目标位置。例如，**Google Sheets** 或 **Airtable** 表格、**.CSV** 文件，或任何关系型数据库如 **MySQL**。

通常，您需要确保将格式良好的数据发送到电子表格或数据库节点。您可以使用 [Set](https://docs.n8n.io/nodes/n8n-nodes-base.set/#set) 或 [Function](https://docs.n8n.io/nodes/n8n-nodes-base.function/#function) 节点将数据转换为适合目标位置的正确格式。

![key_to_table.png](https://f000.backblazeb2.com/file/n8n-website-images/a50b94ba5b3a4b15a288553c797b55a3.png)

## 关键概念

  * 电子表格和数据库有列，如“姓名”和“电子邮件”。您发送到电子表格/数据库节点的数据需要与这些列名匹配，以便插入每一行数据。数据点需要表示为键值对。具体来说，每个数据项需要为表格中的每一列提供一个 JSON 键。对于包含“姓名”和“电子邮件”列的表格，其格式应为：**{"Name" : "Karla", "Email" : "[karla@email.com](mailto:karla@email.com)"}**

  * 在向电子表格或数据库追加或插入数据之前，您可能需要将其转换为正确的格式。您可以使用 [Set](https://docs.n8n.io/nodes/n8n-nodes-base.set/#set) 或 [Function](https://docs.n8n.io/nodes/n8n-nodes-base.function/#function) 节点预处理数据。当您要加载到表格行的数据已经表示为项目时，Set 节点允许您执行简单的转换。如果您需要将单个项目中的嵌套数据（如数组）映射到它们自己的顶级项目，请使用 Function 节点（[社区论坛示例](https://community.n8n.io/t/getting-all-items-from-trello-api-call/4567/8)）。

  * n8n 中的电子表格和数据库节点对每个输入数据项执行其配置的操作（如 **Append**、**Create Row**、**Write to File**）。

## 工作流程详解

[![homepage](https://cdn.loom.com/sessions/thumbnails/eb87068f35a14af095f7b0f020b62211-with-play.jpg)](https://www.loom.com/share/eb87068f35a14af095f7b0f020b62211)
title_zh: 将数据载入电子表格或数据库
